greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors of p+1, p prime.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..999 (offset adapted by Michel Marcus)
maple: for i from 1 to 500 do if isprime(i) then print(sigma(i+1)); fi; od;
mathematica: lst={};Do[AppendTo[lst, DivisorSigma[1, Prime[n]+1]], {n, 6!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 20 2008 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
